sentences.sContent: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.sCn: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.sContent: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.sCn: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.sContent: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.sCn: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.sContent: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
